title: Consult the days off/vacation of past periods
content: You can now view an employee's day off/vacation history for past periods.To do this :In the main menu, Employees, go to the file of the employee for whom you want to consult this information,Click on the gray Vacation button (at the bottom),Click on Choose another period at the bottom right,Select the date of the desired period with the calendar button,Click Select to load the history.You now have access to the entire history of the period to which the selected date of day off/vacation belongs.Please note that this feature does not allow you to make any changes, and is for advisory purposes only.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
